about_the_game: Continue the story in Save The Countryside, the third DLC for The Book Of Yorle. Explore the hillside while fighting against the Evil Ones. Swim in the lake but make sure to hold your breath and don't drown! Search for mysteries that lie beneath the volcano. Find out what happened to the fisherman that supplied the village. Rest at the famous Twin Dragon Inn.
detailed_description: Continue the story in Save The Countryside, the third DLC for The Book Of Yorle. Explore the hillside while fighting against the Evil Ones. Swim in the lake but make sure to hold your breath and don't drown! Search for mysteries that lie beneath the volcano. Find out what happened to the fisherman that supplied the village. Rest at the famous Twin Dragon Inn.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio Codec - Stereo
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 Surround Sound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Audio Codec - Stereo
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad Core 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 Surround Sound

short_description: Continue the story in Save The Countryside, the third DLC for The Book Of Yorle. Explore the hillside while fighting against the Evil Ones. Swim in the lake but make sure to hold your breath and don't drown! Search for mysteries that lie beneath the volcano. Find out what happened to the fisherman that supplied the village.
